des:
Boldr Energy Skill allows you to effortlessly integrate Alexa with your Boldr energy system. With simple voice commands, you can control your hardware, and optimize efficiency to make your home smarter and greener.

Getting Started:

1) Download the Boldr app from the App Store or Google Play Store.
2) Create an account or log in to your existing Boldr account.
3) Enable the Boldr Energy skill in your Alexa app.
4) Link your Boldr account with Alexa by following the on-screen instructions in the Alexa app.
5) Start controlling your home energy system with commands like, “Alexa, adjust the thermostat to 22 degrees.”

Features:
Voice-Activated Controls: Adjust settings such as thermostat temperature or system modes.
Temperature Monitoring: Check the current indoor temperature of your room.
System Checks: Evaluate connections and make sure devices are online.

Requirements:
Compatible with all Boldr hardware systems.
Requires an existing Boldr account.
Internet connectivity is necessary for account linking and voice command processing.
